rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
患有 Omicron 的儿童三天后不具有传染性，疫苗接种状况无关研究发现，无论是否接种疫苗，儿童中 SARS-CoV-2 的 Omicron 变种的中位感染持续时间为三天。研究结果表明，当前的 5 天隔离政策得到了支持，但返校指南中无需考虑疫苗接种或加强状态。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Kids-with-Omicron-non-infectious-after-third-days-vaccination-status-irrelevant.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Kids-with-Omicron-non-infectious-after-third-days-vaccination-status-irrelevant.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87a60a39-67b1-4911-b5de-e2c93430065f Tue, 24 Oct 2023 21:42:00 -0400 Kids with Omicron non-infectious after three days, vaccination status irrelevant
社区免疫：引导 SARS-CoV-2 的进化进程德国研究人员开发了一种综合适应度模型，通过整合遗传、流行病学和免疫学数据来预测 SARS-CoV-2 的进化。该研究强调了群体免疫在形成病毒突变中的作用，并为新变种的出现提供了宝贵的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Community-immunity-Steering-the-evolutionary-course-of-SARS-CoV-2.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Community-immunity-Steering-the-evolutionary-course-of-SARS-CoV-2.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e470493f-6361-42af-baae-83a2926ceb84 Tue, 24 Oct 2023 21:10:00 -0400 Community immunity: Steering the evolutionary course of SARS-CoV-2
揭开谜团：研究揭示了令人惊讶的人类免疫细胞中心以色列的研究人员全面绘制了人体组织中初级免疫细胞的分布和质量图。这项开创性的研究采用先进的生物技术方法，提供了对免疫系统细胞网络的见解，挑战了现有的观念，并强调骨髓、淋巴结和脾脏作为主要的免疫细胞储存库。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Mapping-the-mysteries-Study-reveals-surprising-hubs-of- human-immune-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Mapping-the-mysteries-Study-reveals-surprising-hubs-of- human-immune-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7efe426-a4cc-4976-a621-dd220a6a13f7 Tue, 24 Oct 2023 20:41:00 -0400 Mapping the mysteries: Study reveals surprising hubs of human immune cells
微生物群能否成为诊断和治疗胆道癌的关键？ 《微生物》最近的一项研究深入研究了微生物组与胆道癌之间的关系，揭示了与健康个体相比，患者中不同的微生物组成。这项研究强调了潜在的诊断生物标志物，并表明改变肠道微生物组成可能会增强对癌症免疫疗法的反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Could-the-microbiome-hold-the-key-to-diagnosing-and-treating-biliary-tract-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Could-the-microbiome-hold-the-key-to-diagnosing-and-treating-biliary-tract-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b7674f1-0bb4-421e-ad6c-774850c22950 Tue, 24 Oct 2023 19:48:00 -0400 Could the microbiome hold the key to diagnosing and treating biliary tract cancer?
研究发现，COVID-19 幸存者面临睡眠之战，其中 ARDS 患者受到的打击最严重《临床医学杂志》最近的一项研究探讨了经历急性呼吸窘迫综合征 (ARDS) 的 COVID-19 幸存者对睡眠和昼夜节律的长期影响。调查结果显示，出院一年后，超过 91% 的患者睡眠质量不佳，其中近 59% 经历失眠，凸显了 COVID-19 对睡眠健康的持久影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/COVID-19-survivors-face-sleep-battles-with-ARDS-病人-hardest-hit-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/COVID-19-survivors-face-sleep-battles-with-ARDS-病人-hardest-hit-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a88ba98-14f1-436f-8c09-49b99b9a731f Tue, 24 Oct 2023 19:38:00 -0400 COVID-19 survivors face sleep battles, with ARDS patients hardest hit, study finds
研究显示生酮饮食可提高多囊卵巢综合症女性试管受精的成功率《营养》杂志最近的一项研究调查了饮食干预措施（包括地中海饮食 (MD) 和极低热量生酮饮食 (VLCKD)）对患有多囊卵巢综合征 (PCOS) 的超重或肥胖女性进行体外治疗的影响受精（IVF）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Ketogenic-diet-boosts-IVF-success-for-women-with-PCOS-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Ketogenic-diet-boosts-IVF-success-for-women-with-PCOS-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8904489-a2d9-4af1-8d92-86abf16f1772 Tue, 24 Oct 2023 19:30:00 -0400 Ketogenic diet boosts IVF success for women with PCOS, study reveals
使用尼马瑞韦/利托那韦治疗 COVID-19 的肺移植受者中常见病毒反弹关于肺移植（LTx）受者中尼马曲韦/利托那韦的病毒反弹和安全性的数据有限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Viral-rebound-common-in-lung-transplant-recipients-treatment-with-nirmatrelvirritonavir-for-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Viral-rebound-common-in-lung-transplant-recipients-treatment-with-nirmatrelvirritonavir-for-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41610500-b7ec-474d-b82c-435890017a56 Tue, 24 Oct 2023 15:36:04 -0400 Viral rebound common in lung transplant recipients treated with nirmatrelvir/ritonavir for COVID-19
含有分子佐剂的重组狂犬病病毒疫苗可诱导小鼠产生强烈的免疫反应和保护这项研究旨在提高狂犬病疫苗的有效性，以帮助缓解和消除狂犬病流行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Recombinant-rabies-virus-vaccine-with-molecular-adjuvant-induces-strong-immune-responses-and-protection-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Recombinant-rabies-virus-vaccine-with-molecular-adjuvant-induces-strong-immune-responses-and-protection-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=021574f1-f00c-4187-a68c-e37cc88e20e5 Tue, 24 Oct 2023 15:34:21 -0400 Recombinant rabies virus vaccine with molecular adjuvant induces strong immune responses and protection in mice
甘蔗灰释放的有毒物质可能导致农业工人神秘的肾病根据《美国肾脏疾病杂志》今天发表的一篇论文，燃烧甘蔗和稻壳可能会释放一种有毒物质，导致农业工人患上神秘的肾脏疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Toxicant-released-from-sugarcane-ash-may-be-causing-mysterious-kidney-disease-in-agriculture-workers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Toxicant-released-from-sugarcane-ash-may-be-causing-mysterious-kidney-disease-in-agriculture-workers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=00026587-14c9-4e35-b03d-9d8481759aef Tue, 24 Oct 2023 15:24:00 -0400 Toxicant released from sugarcane ash may be causing mysterious kidney disease in agricultural workers
生物膜益生菌可有效预防仔猪模型中的坏死性小肠结肠炎坏死性小肠结肠炎 (NEC) 是一种使早产婴儿衰弱且致命的疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Biofilm-probiotic- effective-in-preventing-necrotizing-enterocolitis-in-piglet-model.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Biofilm-probiotic- effective-in-preventing-necrotizing-enterocolitis-in-piglet-model.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a05a6cea-0e5c-4b39-be2c-7a9e6d73ce62 Tue, 24 Oct 2023 15:18:01 -0400 Biofilm probiotic effective in preventing necrotizing enterocolitis in piglet model
